most countries for example Sweden Canada

there are some countries islands also
where you do need to use the article duh
now an easy rule to remember is if the
country has a political title okay so if
you see the word Republic or the
People's Democratic Republic or anything
like that in the countries title you
will use the okay okay so if you have
like the Democratic Republic of North
Korea or if you have the People's
Republic of China anything like that you
will always have the
there are also some islands such as the

is not consistent with islands because
then you also have Malaysia which is a
group of islands but you don't really

not consistent however if you would like
to learn which which ones do use the
which ones don't use the unfortunately
it's just practice and checking it out
online okay
in terms of landmarks for example if you
have buildings structures statues things
like that like for example Eiffel Tower
Statue of Liberty you need to use the in

so again to review four continents we do
not use the four countries most
